description: Try our easy to follow Amazonia Acai Breakfast Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Acai bowl,Seafood free,Blueberry,Gluten free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Amazonia Acai Breakfast Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 75g Food For Health Nutty Almond Clusters

recipeInstructions.text: Line the bottom of a bowl with most of the granola
Combine Amazonia Acai Energy, Frozen Eco Banana and Coconut water in a blender until smooth and creamy.
Spoon into a bowl and garnish with the fresh Eco Banana, remaining granola, sliced strawberries, blueberries.
